sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.KickoffDevopsPipeline</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>KickoffDevopsPipeline</name><script><![CDATA[var KickoffDevopsPipeline = Class.create();KickoffDevopsPipeline.prototype = { initialize: function() {}, start: function(updateSetName) { var body = {}; body['u_user_name'] = gs.getUserName(); body['u_update_set_name'] = String(updateSetName); body['u_pipeline_status'] = 'Created'; var requestBody = JSON.stringify(body); var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2(); request.setEndpoint('https://dev71459.service-now.com/api/now/table/u_devops_pipeline'); request.setHttpMethod('POST'); //Eg. UserName="admin", Password="admin" for this code sample. var user = 'admin'; var password = '7gsfWTH*c1@M'; request.setBasicAuth(user, password); request.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json"); request.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json'); request.setRequestBody(requestBody); var response = request.execute(); var responseBody = response.getBody(); gs.log(responseBody); }, type: 'KickoffDevopsPipeline'};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-20 06:30:55</sys_created_on><sys_id>5762a8b247eab110a3648c64116d4384</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>KickoffDevopsPipeline</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5762a8b247eab110a3648c64116d4384</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-20 09:38:58</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
